item.title: Rocket.chat Setup on LXC Container
item.description: Rocket.chat Setup This a basic guide on how we can install Rocket.chat on Ubuntu LXC. This is a part 1 of 2 part series. In this part, we will look into how to install MongoDB, NodeJS & Rocket.Chat and also configure them. In the next part, we will see how to reverse proxy the localhost:3000 to a domain and install SSL certificate. Requirements Ubuntu: 20.04 NodeJS: 14.19.3 NPM: 6.14.17 Mongodb: 5.
